segments.text: Leo ! I wanted to tell you thanks for all your hard work on the budget . We ’ re having a get-together after work tonight at Carl ’ s Karaoke Club to celebrate having finished it . We ’ d love to see
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What fun ! Normally I ’ d love to , but I ’ m afraid I have to work late tonight . We ’ Ve got to get the contract ready for Miss King .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , right . You ’ re busy with that contract . Maybe you could join us later ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , I just can ’ t make it this time . I have to go straight home . It ’ s my second wedding anniversary , and we ’ re supposed to be having a big dinner Susan would kill me if I missed it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Happy anniversary ! Sorry you won ’ t be there . Maybe some other time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , maybe . Thanks , anyway . Hope you guys have a great time !
segments.speaker: S2
